name: Cruis'n
description:
An all new version of the classic Midway arcade racer, Cruis'n is coming
exclusively to the Wii. Choose your ride from an impressive lineup of
licensed cars and experience a rush of adrenaline as you race opponents
through twelve different street circuits using the Wii Remote™ to steer
and perform outrageous stunts. Win races and earn upgrades including:
turbos, body kits, neon and nitrous, allowing you to create the ultimate
ride.
